name: df-tskm
body: |- wceq(ctskm, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(crab(s1, ctsk, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

comment: A function that maps a set ` x ` to the smallest Tarski class that contains the set. (Contributed by FL, 30-Dec-2010.)
